survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with In-Flight Wi-Fi Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from passengers regarding their satisfaction with in-flight Wi-Fi services to help airlines improve connectivity offerings.

questions.question_text: On your most recent flight, did you use the in-flight Wi-Fi service?
answer_options: I did not know it was available
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to quickly determine Wi-Fi usage rates.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the speed of the in-flight Wi-Fi?
questions.routing_logic: Only appears if Q1 is answered with 'Yes'.
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
